description:
Combined with the right training, this kit helps you evaluate snowpacks and slopes while traveling in the backcountry.

  • Durable fabric carry case has slots and pockets for each tool
  • Calibratable thermometer has a range of -50 to 200°C
  • Slope meter has an angle range of 0-60 degrees and can be read from the side and above
  • 15x magnifying loupe features a folding metal base and glass lens
  • Polycarbonate crystal card includes snow grain classifications, slope angle map tool, and a 2mm grid to help with snowpack evaluations
  • 2m cord to cut through snow and crust
name: Backcountry Access Snow Study Kit
